# Topic 03 — 邮件：回复邀请

## Directions (要求)

<Bilingual cn="阅读你的教授 Jack Smith 发来的以下电子邮件并写一封回复。">Read the following e-mail from your professor Jack Smith and write a reply.</Bilingual>

<br>

<blockquote>
<Bilingual cn="亲爱的李明，">Dear Li Ming,</Bilingual>
<br><br>
<Bilingual cn="我们学校正在组织一个机器人比赛，我写信邀请你的研究团队参加。">Our school is organizing a robotics competition, and I’m writing to invite your research team to participate.</Bilingual>
<br><br>
<Bilingual cn="如果你们感兴趣，请简要介绍一下你们机器人的主要功能。如果有什么我能帮忙的，请告诉我。">If you are interested, please briefly introduce the main functions of your robot. Let me know if there’s anything I can help.</Bilingual>
<br><br>
<Bilingual cn="此致，">Best regards,</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="杰克·史密斯">Jack Smith</Bilingual>
</blockquote>

<br>

<Bilingual cn="在答题纸上写100个单词左右。">Write your answer in about 100 words on the ANSWER SHEET.</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="不要在邮件中使用你自己的名字。请使用“Li Ming”。(10分)">Do not use your own name in your e-mail. Use “Li Ming” instead. (10 points)</Bilingual>

<br>

## ✏️ 参考范文

<Bilingual cn="尊敬的史密斯教授：">Dear Professor Smith,</Bilingual>

<p><Bilingual cn="很高兴收到您的邀请，我们非常乐意参加。今天写信来是想介绍一下我们机器人的主要功能。">I’m so glad to receive your invitation and we’re perfectly willing to participate. Today, I am writing for the purpose of introducing the main functions of our robot.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="与过去相比，现代社会老年人的比例和数量均有显著增长。因此，我们设计了一款机器人，可以在家里为他们提供陪伴。">Compared to the past years, both the proportion and number of elderly citizens in modern society have increased significantly. Thus, we have designed a robot to provide companionship for them at home.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="这款机器人的特色是功能多样且强大，比如打扫房间、唱歌、讲故事、聊天以及拨打紧急电话。">The robot is characterized by diverse and powerful functions, such as cleaning rooms, singing, telling stories, chatting, and making emergency calls.</Bilingual> <Bilingual cn="我们认为，它能为老年人带来欢乐，激发他们对生活的热情，并帮助他们缓解孤独。">We deem that it can bring the elderly joy, inspire their passion for life, and help them ease the loneliness.</Bilingual></p>

<p><Bilingual cn="如您能将比赛的具体时间、地点及日程安排告知我们，我们将不胜感激。">We would be grateful if you could inform us of the specific time, place, and schedule of the competition.</Bilingual></p>

<Bilingual cn="您真诚的">Yours sincerely,</Bilingual>
<br>
<Bilingual cn="李明">Li Ming</Bilingual>
